name: popsicle-no-cache
description: Prevent caching of Popsicle HTTP requests

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-cov

readme:
# Popsicle No Cache

[![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]
[![NPM downloads][downloads-image]][downloads-url]
[![Build status][travis-image]][travis-url]
[![Test coverage][coveralls-image]][coveralls-url]

> Prevent caching of HTTP requests.

## Installation

```
npm install popsicle-no-cache --save
```

## Usage

```javascript
var request = require('popsicle')
var nocache = require('popsicle-no-cache')

request('/users.json')
  .use(nocache())
```

## License

MIT
